fields.notesFormatted:
Random lessons from a tough goodbye:

Genesis 49, Galatians 6:7-10

  1. Most consequences don’t come with an expiration date.
  2. Love your wife, love your kids, but put God first.
  3. Live a life amongst your critics that deserves respect.

What’s the point?

Micah 5:2, Matthew 2:6, Revelation 19:11-16

  • The point of Jacob’s story is Jesus.
  • The point of Joseph’s story is Jesus.
  • The point of Judah’s story is Jesus.
  • The point of the Genesis story is Jesus.
  • The point of our story is Jesus.
